short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove all 'Featured' and 'Sponsored' properties from StreetEasy search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This lightweight extension will remove all Featured and Sponsored search results from StreetEasy. It's only active on search results pages and collects no information.
